PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01262018-02-12,  ,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) promote compliance with public safety standards in matters of transportation of dangerous goods; and (2) provide enforcement authorities responsible for enforcing the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992 an additional tool for carrying out their mandate more effectively.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0019 Publication Date: 2018-02-21
AttachmentsAttachment
